title: NPI Service Engineer
description: Be part of a diverse team that pushes boundaries, developing custom silicon solutions that power the future of Google's direct-to-consumer products. You'll contribute to the innovation behind products loved by millions worldwide. Your expertise will shape the next generation of hardware experiences, delivering unparalleled performance, efficiency, and integration.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Electrical, Process, or Manufacturing Engineering, or equivalent practical experience. Experience in design for manufacturability and serviceability.
preferred_qualifications: 2 years of experience in setting up manufacturing assembly processes, driving new product launches and assembly process optimization within manufacturing operation. Excellent sense of ownership with the ability to be detail-oriented and organized.
responsibilities: Lead the technical development and implementation of service processes, tools, fixtures, and manuals related to NPI product development of Consumer Hardware Service Operations. Work closely with cross-functional teams to lead technical issue investigation and resolutions during the product development cycle. Lead the qualification of new product service capabilities at authorized service provider sites. Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to understand product service requirements and drive continuous optimization in products design for repairability and serviceability. Track and report on NPI service metrics such as design for service score, repair yield, and touch time.
